column3:
John bought a new puppy. He named the new puppy Spike. Spike was a good dog and minded
ewlineJohn. John took Spike to the pond behind his house. Spike loved playing in the water. John
ewlinewould throw the frisbee to Spike. He would also throw a bone to Spike. Spike loved
ewlinerunning. Jessica came to the pond to visit John. Jessica and Tom always played with
ewlineJohn. Jessica was John's best friend. They both loved Spike and Spike loved them. Jessica
ewlinebrought lunch to the pond. She also brought colas to the pond. They ate and Spike sat by
ewlinethem being a good dog. When they were done eating they packed their lunch up. They put
ewlineSpike on his leash and they went home.
column4: multiple: What did Jessica bring to the pond?
column9: one: What is John's puppy's name?
column14: multiple: What did John throw to Spike?
